alert.note: Alert for Eastern Albany; Eastern Columbia; Eastern Greene; Eastern Rensselaer; Schoharie; Western Albany; Western Columbia; Western Greene; Western Rensselaer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 8:56PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A line of showers with gusty winds and maybe some embedded thunder will impact portions of northeastern Columbia, southern Albany, northern Greene, southern Schoharie and southwestern Rensselaer Counties through 945 PM EST... At 854 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers with gusty winds and maybe some embedded thunder over Jefferson, or 17 miles southwest of Cobleskill, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... East Greenbush, Chatham, Nassau, Jefferson, New Baltimore, Westerlo, Ravena, Stephentown, Coxsackie, Valatie, Windham, Austerlitz, Castleton-On-Hudson, Gilboa, Kinderhook, Prattsville, Breakabeen, Selkirk, Livingstonville and North Blenheim. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 near exit 10. Interstate 87 between exits 21B and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Albany; Eastern Columbia; Eastern Greene; Eastern Rensselaer; Schoharie; Western Albany; Western Columbia; Western Greene; Western Rensselaer
